title: Manageble doses…a quick reference guide for cutting carbon
author: Tom Price
content:
Someone wrote in to point out the Cooling Man.org site has a great list of simple things a person can do to cut their carbon footprint, so why bury the light under a bushel, as my bishop used to say? Good question, no reason, so here you go:
